definitions.definition: A layer of cells between the xylem and the phloem that is responsible for the secondary growth of roots and stems .
Periosteum , a membrane that covers the outer surface of bones
One of the humours formerly believed to nourish the bodily organs.

main_definition: ( botany ) A layer of cells between the xylem and the phloem that is responsible for the secondary growth of roots and stems .
secondary_definitions: ( anatomy ) Periosteum , a membrane that covers the outer surface of bones
( obsolete ) One of the humours formerly believed to nourish the bodily organs.
